00030 /* Creation flags. */
00031 #define T_FPU     XNFPU
00032 #define T_SUSP    XNSUSP
00033 /* <!> High bits must not conflict with XNFPU|XNSHADOW|XNSHIELD|XNSUSP. */
00034 #define T_CPU(cpu) (1 << (24 + (cpu & 7))) /* Up to 8 cpus [0-7] */
00035 #define T_CPUMASK  0xff000000

00165 static inline RT_TASK *thread2rtask (xnthread_t *t)
00166 {
00167     return t ? ((RT_TASK *)(((char *)(t)) - (int)(&((RT_TASK *)0)->thread_base))) : NULL;
00168 }

00297 static inline int rt_task_spawn(RT_TASK *task,
00298                                 const char *name,
00299                                 int stksize,
00300                                 int prio,
00301                                 int mode,
00302                                 void (*entry)(void *cookie),
00303                                 void *cookie)
00304 {
00305     int err = rt_task_create(task,name,stksize,prio,mode);
00306 
00307     if (!err)
00308         err = rt_task_start(task,entry,cookie);
00309 
00310     return err;
00311 }
